name: Eden Beach: The Dragging Chains
description: Beach sand scored by unseen chains forming seven loops. Four barefoot prints with two-step pause. Three silent gulls. Team documenting. Riddle: Ink is not the only thing that writes.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Beach sand scored by unseen chains forming seven loops. Four barefoot prints with two-step pause. Three silent gulls. Team documenting.. Key props numeric: 7 loops, 4 prints, 3 gulls. Cipher letter: M Bearing: 140°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
